chart.name: chart-unpaid-customer
chart.title: Unpaid Invoice Per Customer
chart.dataset: SELECT count(*) as status, p.name as customer FROM Invoice i Left Join Party p on i.party = p.id WHERE p.customer = true AND i.status != 'Paid' AND i.invoiceDate BETWEEN :fromDateTime AND :toDateTime GROUP BY p.name

chart.name: chart-paid-invoice-category-product
chart.title: Paid Invoice Per Category Per Product
chart.dataset: SELECT count(*) as status , c.name as category, p.name as productName FROM Invoice as i , InvoiceLine as l, Product as p, ProductCategory as c WHERE i.id = l.invoice AND l.product = p AND p.category = c AND i.status = 'Paid' AND i.invoiceDate BETWEEN :fromDateTime AND :toDateTime group by c.name ,p.name

chart.name: chart-customer-per-state
chart.title: Customer per State
chart.dataset: Select count(*) as Customers, a.state.name as State from Party p, Address a where p.customer = true and a.id=any(select add.id from p.address add) group by a.state.name

chart.name: chart-invoice-amount-per-status
chart.title: Invoice Amount per Status
chart.dataset: select i.status as Status,sum(i.netAmount) as Amount from Invoice i group by i.status

chart.name: chart-invoice-number-per-status
chart.title: Invoice Number per Status
chart.dataset: select count(*) as Status,sum(i.netAmount) as Amount from Invoice i group by i.status
